howToPlay.title: How to play
howToPlay.paragraph1: The player has to memorize each word that appears for a limited time on the screen.
howToPlay.paragraph2: And then the player has to enter those words, one by one, in a text box.
howToPlay.paragraph3: If the player writes all the words correctly and in the correct order, then the level will increase. Otherwise, the player has to try again.

text.endText: You have completed all levels. Congratulations!
text.paragraph1: Write the words in the correct order
